short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize background and text colors on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReadEnhance is a tool for Chrome that lets you customize background and text colors on a web page. It was created from a desire to make reading on the web less straining on the eyes and more enjoyable.

--Usage--
You can choose from 4 pre-set themes: warm, cool, dark and light. To switch things up, use the custom color pickers. To reset any changes, simply refresh the page.

--Contact--
Have any bugs, feedback, or requests for new features? I would love to hear from you. Send me an email at:
timothy.yoon.dev@gmail.com

--Changelog--
v0.1.0
â€¢ Add themes and ability to customize colors of the background and text

--Privacy Notice--
ReadEnhance does not collect any personal information. It saves some data locally, namely any chosen themes and any chosen values for the custom color pickers.

Happy reading!
